name: Tahitian Coconut Vanilla Home Diffuser
about: Fragrance Family:Warm & Spicy.Scent Type:Warm & Sweet Gourmands.Key Notes:Vanilla Bean, Coconut Milk, White Peach.Diffuser Length:4 to 6 months.Fragrance Description:An enticing elixir of Tahitian vanilla bean, coconut milk, and white-peach nectar will transform your home into an unexpected tropical paradise. Vacation is a state of mind and Tahitian Coconut Vanilla will take you there..About the Diffuser:Voluspaâ€™s fragrant diffuser oil is hand-poured into an embossed glass vessel for a subtle pop of elegant decor. Create your home's signature, always-on fragrance in spaces requiring minimal effort, and enjoy for four to six months. Includes 10 rattan reeds for powerful fragrance without overwhelming.
ingredients: Glycol Ether DPMA, Benzyl Benzoate, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylene Brassylate, Tetramethyl Acetyloctahydronaphthalenes, Methydihydrojasmonate, Vanillin, Butylphenyl Methylpropional, 3-Ethoxy-4-hydroxybenzaldehyde, PPG-2 Methyl Ether, Pentamethylcyclopent-3-ene-butanol, Hexyl Salicylate, Ethyl Linalool, gamma-Nonalactone.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Remove the stopper and insert reeds..-Place the diffuser on an oil-resistant surface..-For optimal fragrance, allow reeds to absorb fragrance oil for 24 to 48 hours before flipping..-Gently flip reeds weekly to increase fragrance throw.

reviews.review_title: It's better than plug-in air fresheners
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing scent, my room was smelling so good family even asked where I got it from!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this diffuser hoping that at least my living room would be smelling good. I just can't smell anything. Nothing. Zero. Nada. I just spent $50 dollars for nothing. Terrible

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: smells sooo good! a creamy and warm coconut vanilla and definitely fills the room, plus its super cute too
